name: InsiderThreat
description: A case template for handling insider threat incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of an insider threat

tasks.title: Identify suspicious activity
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the suspicious activity and affected resources

tasks.title: Gather evidence
tasks.description: Collect logs, emails, and other relevant data to establish a timeline and identify involved parties

tasks.title: Secure affected resources
tasks.description: Secure affected resources by changing access controls and revoking credentials

tasks.title: Interview involved parties
tasks.description: Interview the suspected insider and any potential witnesses to gather more information

tasks.title: Implement security improvements
tasks.description: Implement and update security measures to prevent future insider threats

notes.title: Suspicious activity
notes.content: Details of the suspicious activity that led to the investigation

notes.title: Evidence collected
notes.content: Summary of the evidence collected during the investigation

notes.title: Interview outcomes
notes.content: Summary of the interviews conducted during the investigation
